SupportTicket.title: SupportTicket
SupportTicket.description: Represents a support ticket within the SOMA platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the support ticket.

subject.description: Subject line of the support ticket.

message.description: The initial message content of the support ticket.

status.description: The current status of the support ticket.

storeId.description: Reference to Store (UID of the owner).

customerId.description: Reference to Customer. Optional if the user is not logged in.

messages.description: Array of messages associated with the support ticket.

definition.description: Represents a support ticket associated with a store.
